summary: Homepage and theme scaffolding were added (HomePage with hero/sections, Tailwind theme, layout/footer). However, the required generated hero image asset is not evidenced in the diff, and Internet Identity/auth-related functionality was added despite being a stated non-goal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add and display a generated homepage hero image as a static frontend asset stored under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename hero-smart-janghai.dim_1920x1080.png.
missing_requirements.reason: The homepage references the image path, but the diff does not show the actual image file being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the acceptance criterion that the file is present is not met based on provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider/hook wiring and actor creation logic that depends on user identity.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states no user accounts/authentication flows (including Internet Identity) unless requested later, but the diff adds Internet Identity context/provider and uses it in hooks and app bootstrap.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/marketing link to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest and adds external link/attribution content beyond the informational site requirements.
